mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(mId, mEmail, mPwd, mName, mPhone, mPostnum, mAddr1, mAddr2) VALUES(NULL, #{mEmail}, #{mPwd}, #{mName}, #{mPhone}, #{mPostnum}, #{mAddr1}, #{mAddr2})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS 'COUNT' FROM member WHERE mEmail = #{mEmail}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS 'COUNT' FROM member WHERE mEmail = #{mEmail} AND mPwd = #{mPwd}
SELECT mEmail, mPwd, mName FROM member WHERE mEmail = #{mEmail}
